articles.title: Dries Mertens says it was 'tough to pull that shirt on' after Napoli players wore 'Maradona 10' top - Daily Mail
articles.description: On Thursday, outside the stadium which is set to be renamed the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona, thousands of fans laid flowers - and Mertens was very emotional when speaking afterwards.

articles.description: According to CalcioMercato, Juventus think a move in January is unlikely, but next summer they would be keen to arrange a loan move with a £30million option to buy at the end of the deal.
